properties.entry: UPDATE BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT +1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NO, ISSUE_DATE, CREATE_DATE, READ_COUNT, BOARD_CONTENT FROM BOARD B WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND B.STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO REPLY (REPLY_NO, BOARD_NO, USER_NO, REPLY_CONTENT) VALUES (SEQ_CNO.NEXTVAL, ?,?,?)

SELECT REPLY_NO, USER_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(REPLY_DATE , 'YY/MM/DD HH:MI:SS') REPLY_DATE FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER ON (REPLY_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE R.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NO = ? ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC , REPLY_NO
